<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### GenerateComments {#ae610a7dfc17e3c3c1566fbf07446f717}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const bool llvm::BufferByteStreamer::GenerateComments">
Only verbose textual output needs comments.

This will be set to true for that case, and false otherwise. If false, comments passed in to the emit methods will be ignored.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/bytestreamer-h/#l00099">99</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/bytestreamer-h">ByteStreamer.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
